name: Shinoban
description:
The goal of this game is to die, but for some strange reason the devs somebody trapped you in a tower, so it won't be so easy!

BRIEF TUTORIAL FOR THE PUZZLE PART:

  <- This is a box, you can move it and it can press a button

  <- This is a button.

  <- This is the hatch, your only way to escape from the tower (and die). Now it's closed but it opens when all the buttons are pressed.

IMPORTANT: IF YOU'RE STUCK PRESS R TO RESTART THE LEVEL

Credits:

Programming: Cah

Graphics: Cah

Sound Effects: Fused

Level Design: Cah

Logo of the game: Fused
